summaryPoints: Architected and developed **scalable backend APIs (Node.js, Ruby on Rails)** with secure integrations across internal systems and external vendors.
Defined and implemented **microservices architecture** patterns, improving scalability, modularity, and system resilience.
Partnered with product and cloud teams to design **API gateways, JWT/OAuth authentication strategies, and event-driven workflows.**
Developed **React + Redux applications** with responsive mobile-first design, reducing load times by 30%.
Established automated testing strategy (Cypress, Cucumber), achieving **98%+ coverage.**
Collaborated across engineering and QA teams to reduce high-priority bug backlog by 50%.
Applied **AI/ML technologies** (LLMs, RAG, Python ecosystem) to deliver automation and analytics that improved clinical trial operations.
Architected and developed **enterprise-scale applications** leveraging **.NET, React, Node.js, and Azure**, enhancing performance, scalability, and reliability.

Designed and delivered **mission-critical REST APIs** (.NET and Node.js) for healthcare systems, achieving **99.99% uptime** and seamless third-party integrations that reduced development time by **35%.**
Strong hands-on programming expertise in **Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, and C#**, applying best practices for maintainable and high-quality code.
Spearheaded the **migration of monolithic applications to cloud-based microservices (Azure, AWS)**, cutting infrastructure costs by **25%.**
Collaborated with cross-functional teams (PMs, QA, clients) to resolve technical issues and ensure timely project delivery.
Mentored and coached engineers, increasing **team velocity by 20%** and **onboarding speed by 30%**.
Led large-scale **software deployments**, ensuring efficient rollout of complex systems in production.

**Designed and delivered high-performance software solutions** in collaboration with cross-functional teams, **leading large-scale deployments and integrating third-party tools** (ASP.NET, C#, JavaScript, Telerik).
**Optimized database schemas**, improving performance by **40%** and ensuring **robust application functionality** (SQL).
Enhanced and maintained **ASP.NET & SQL** applications across multiple platforms.
